Type '?' for help.In [1]: from bstb.core import Waypoint ...: from bstb.greatcircle import bearing ...: from bstb.greatcircle import distance ...: ...: wp0 = Waypoint.parse("N52 00.000 E004 00.000") ...: wp1 = Waypoint.parse("N51 58.000 E004 10.000") ...: b = bearing(wp0, wp1) ...: d = distance(wp0, wp1) ...: ...: print(f"Bearing: {b}, Distance: {d} km") ...:Bearing: 107.9, Distance: 12.001 km```
